faq.answer1: Path of Exile is a free-to-play action RPG game developed by Grinding Gear Games.
faq.question2: What kind of Path of Exile currency, services and items do you sell?
faq.answer2: Everything you need for Path of Exile is here! We stock a massive range of PoE currency - from Divine and Chaos Orbs to Exalted Orbs and even Mirrors of Kalandra. You'll also find highly sought-after unique items, and essential services like power leveling and professional build creating. Dive into our catalog to see all we offer!
faq.question3: Which Path of Exile league do you sell items for?
faq.answer3: Yes, we cater to both the Standard league and the current Challenge (temporary) League in Path of Exile. Please ensure you select the correct league when placing your order to guarantee items are delivered to the right place.
faq.question4: Are the items and currency for POE1 and POE2? And for which platforms?
faq.answer4: Currently, our primary focus is on Path of Exile 1 & 2 for PC. At this time, we do not offer support for console versions (PlayStation/Xbox).
faq.question5: How do I contact you if I have questions or issues?
faq.answer5: You can contact us via email at support@pathoftrade.com or use the contact form on our website. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
faq.answers-to-some-questions: Answers to some questions you might have.

path-of-exile-1.title: Settlers of Kalguur
path-of-exile-1.description: In Settlers of Kalguur, players help Kalguuran pioneers build the town of Kingsmarch and establish trade between Wraeclast and their homeland.
changes: New Settlers of Kalguur Challenge League
Resource gathering and town building mechanics
New Currency Trade Market with Black Market NPC
New Warden class replacing Raider Ascendancy
New encounters in Tier 16 and Tier 17 Maps

path-of-exile-2.title: Path of Exile 2
path-of-exile-2.description: Path of Exile 2 is a free-to-play MMORPG developed and published by Grinding Gear Games. The sequel to 2013's Path of Exile, launching in paid Early Access on Windows PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X and Series S.
changes: 12 Character Classes with three Ascendancy subclasses each
Brand new graphics engine with high-fidelity visuals

features.title: New Campaign
features.description: Takes place several years after the events of the first game, featuring new areas, towns, and characters.

features.title: League Mechanics
features.description: Continues the tradition of temporary challenge leagues with unique mechanics and rewards.

features.title: Equipment System
features.description: Features hundreds of equipment base types with magical modifiers and unique variants with ancient powers.

features.title: Customizable Skill System
features.description: Any class can use any Skill Gem, modified with up to 5 Support Gems. Dual-Specialisation allows switching between two fighting styles.
